DOC.criteria: Age 913 first HPV vaccine dose Mother/legal guardian daughter interested willing girl receive HPV vaccine Mother/legal guardian daughter indicate would able return clinic three vaccine dose Girls known history allergy severe reaction vaccine , food medicine Pregnant adolescent exclude . If girl becomes pregnant first dose administer , provide second third dose Girls moderate severe illness ask postpone vaccination eg . Pneumonia .
